Invocation Name: i. d. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you can control your heat pump of the iDM Energiesysteme GmbH.

First you have to connect to myIDM when activating the skill and select the heat pump you want to control.

Prerequisites:
- myIDM account
- iDM heat pump with Navigator 2.0
- Internet connection at the heat pump

What option does this voice control offer?
With "Alexa, tell iDM, that I need help." you can navigate through the voice commands.
